DOC.detailed_description: There two sequence , one one physical activity program . Each sequence contain one `` rest '' session one `` exercise '' session . Each session contain : blood sample regular interval ( Leptin , Ghrélin , CCK , PYY , GLP-1 ) , sleep assessment ( Pittsburg scale ) , assessment hunger sensation regular interval , assessment food intake `` ad libitum '' lunch diner indirectly SU.VI.MAX . tool . During `` rest `` session : Blood sample , assessment hunger sensation , assessment food intake realize morning . Physical condition ( VO2 max , DEXA , muscular test ) , insulin-sensibility , lipid profile , also assess . During `` exercise '' session : identical first session intense exercise 40 minute realize 70 % patient 's VO2 max . The peripherical blood output measure non-invasive method : Near-Infra-Red-Spectroscopy , exercise . The 3-months-physical activity program : 4 session 30 minute 2 session 1 hour per week . Most exercises session realize home one 1-hour session per week control sport educator .
DOC.criteria: Overweight adolescent ( 90 th percentile international cutoff point ) With computer internet connection Sedentary ( accord IPAQA questionnaire ) Without eat disorder ( accord DEBQ questionnaire ) Medical surgical antecedent incompatible study : cardiovascular , endocrine digestive disease .
